journal.judul: Implementation of Blockchain Technology in E-Commerce Supply Chain Management
journal.nama_jurnal: International Journal of Information Technology and Business Management
journal.abstrak: This research explores the application of blockchain technology to enhance transparency and security in e-commerce supply chain management systems.

journal.judul: Virtual Reality in Education: A Systematic Review of Game-Based Learning
journal.abstrak: A comprehensive review of VR applications in educational games, analyzing effectiveness and user engagement metrics across various learning scenarios.

journal.judul: Penerapan Business Intelligence untuk Analisis Customer Behavior di Platform Marketplace Indonesia
journal.abstrak: Penelitian ini menganalisis perilaku konsumen menggunakan tools Business Intelligence untuk memberikan insight strategis bagi pengembangan bisnis marketplace di Indonesia.

journal.judul: Deep Learning Approach for Real-Time Fraud Detection in Financial Transaction Systems
journal.nama_jurnal: Journal of Financial Technology and Accounting
journal.abstrak: This study proposes a deep learning model for detecting fraudulent transactions in real-time with high accuracy, enhancing security in financial systems.

journal.judul: Gamification in E-Commerce: Increasing Customer Engagement Through Interactive Features
journal.nama_jurnal: International Journal of Electronic Commerce Studies
journal.abstrak: Research on implementing gamification elements to boost user engagement and retention in e-commerce platforms through interactive game mechanics.

journal.judul: Augmented Reality untuk Peningkatan Pengalaman Berbelanja Online di Era Digital
journal.abstrak: Studi tentang implementasi AR untuk meningkatkan customer experience dalam online shopping dengan visualisasi produk 3D yang interaktif.

journal.judul: Cloud-Based Accounting Information Systems for Small and Medium Enterprises
journal.nama_jurnal: Asian Journal of Business and Accounting
journal.abstrak: Investigation of cloud-based accounting systems adoption by SMEs, examining benefits, challenges, and implementation strategies.

journal.judul: Pengembangan Sistem ERP Terintegrasi untuk Meningkatkan Efisiensi Operasional Perusahaan
journal.abstrak: Penelitian tentang implementasi sistem ERP yang terintegrasi untuk meningkatkan efisiensi operasional dan pengambilan keputusan strategis.
